ygData.subject: re: Re: Do you have to be a gnome to do tinkering??
ygData.msgSnippet: BTW, the toolbox makes an excellent container for those of use who don t have magical weight reducing ones. It only weights 0.4 pounds (same as a large sewing
ygData.messageBody:
BTW, the toolbox makes an excellent container for those of use who don't have magical
weight reducing ones. It only weights 0.4 pounds (same as a large sewing kit) and holds 8
items. So, even if you aren't tinkering yet, they are good to buy.

Arkham, gnome necromancer (Bertoxxulous server)

P.S. Any date on a Bertoxxulous Gnomefest yet ?


> ** Original Subject: Re: [EQ_Tinkering] Do you have to be a gnome to do tinkering??
> ** Original Sender: mstokes <mstokes@...>
> ** Original Date: Mon, 25 Oct 1999 09:48:15 -0400

> ** Original Message follows...

>
> From: mstokes <mstokes@...>
>
> "Drake, Robert, CTR, SAM-OPAA" wrote:
>
> > From: "Drake, Robert, CTR, SAM-OPAA" <Robert.Drake@...>
> >
> > Yes, only Gnomes can tinker.
>
> Its cheap enough to try though. I'd wait until level 17, then buy a Toolkit
> and a a couple of backpacks of Gnomish spirits and water. Start combining.
> I'd be interested in seeing if this works.
>
>
>** --------- End Original Message ----------- **

>
